name: Go To Hell (Syntax_3rr0r)
description:
USE MOUSE WHEEL TO CHANGE ITEM

MOUSE REQUIRED, TRACKPAD WILL NOT WORK WELL

Do you find daily life boring? Do you hate your neighbors? Well, now you can work for death and harvest their souls by tossing them into the underworld. 

Collect souls and upgrade your soul collecting abilities, all while sentencing innocent townspeople to their death! 

But beware, one farmer may try to rise against you,......
